attributes.action: Form a cross-party government to serve in the wake of Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
It seems wrong that only one party should rule at such a crucial time, especially as the elected leader of that party has announced his resignation. 

During other critical moments in history, such as during wartime or the Great Depression, a cross-party government has been formed in the interests of the country. 

Though we are not necessarily in such a dire situation, our actions now may have serious consequences not only for Britain, but for the rest of the world.
attributes.background: Britain's decision to leave the European Union is one that will undoubtedly cause great change within Britain and across the world. In light of this momentous decision, it seems fitting that a cross-party government is formed as Britain redefines and negotiates the place it has in the world.
